item.title: Disable SSH on your EC2 instances
item.description: If you have to SSH into your servers, then your automation has failed. I know, crazy… To make the transition to this mindset easier you could just disable access to port 22 in your instance security group configuration. This will highlight the things you still need to automate while still having the ability to enable access your instances to remedy immediate operational issues. Disabling inbound SSH will stop you from cheating.
